member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the thread affinity for a new DispatcherQueueController.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE.DQTYPE_THREAD_DEDICATED
member.summary: Specifies that the DispatcherQueueController be created on a dedicated thread. With this option, creates a thread, the DispatcherQueueController instance, and runs the dispatcher queue event loop on the newly created thread.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE.DQTYPE_THREAD_CURRENT
member.summary: Specifies that the DispatcherQueueController will be created on the caller's thread.
